title: Looking for Furries on OCE League of Legends server
body:
Anybody part of the furry fandom. 
Add - PatchTheAkita
I'm trying to gather up all the furries I can on this server! So we call all be furry friends. yay

replies.body: I'm up for it but this isn't my main add Goldendo 2 in game.

Add me!

IGN: Molendo 3

If that doesnt work also add:
Rainbow Windslash

:^)

I think it would be more wise to hang out in furry communities and ask if people play League of Legends than to do the same in reverse.

Sure, only a small percent of Furries play League of Legends, but an astronomically smaller percent of League of Legends players are furries.

Oh, you could also use some Ahri or Rengar baits to try and get more people to try the game out ( cash in with your referral link and unlock those cool skins that noone remembers or really cares about )

Best of luck!

edit: just realised this thread is 2 years old, not 2 days old. Darn.  oh well, advice is probably still good ish....
I am a furry gamer, my animal spirit is that of the inland taipan, please respect my right to slither around and my right to hiss at and bite whomever I wish for whatever reasons I wish.

>
> Goddamit.

Yo bruh some random guy added me cuz he thought I is you lol

i don't care if i get banned.

kill yourself you degenerate sack of shit. being a furry is the ultimate sin. you are on par with nazis, ISIS, the KKK and all the other fucked up groups in the world. you have no right to live if you are a furry.
What's a furry and what is this thread?

It really depends on which definition you are using. Generally speaking though a furry is someone who enjoys and/or cosplays anthropomorphic beings (anthro basically meaning animals with human characteristics, there are a few examples in LoL).
Add me on my OCE account Problematic Troll
I bet you're a bronie you sick little boy
